text: Ara yara kichu jane na tara [1] bale, allahâ€Œ amadera sathe katha bale na kena? Athaba amadera kache kena ase na kono ayata?â€™ Ebhabe tadera purbabatira'o tadera mata katha balato. Tadera antara eka'i rakama [2]. Abasya'i amara ayatasamuhake spastabhabe bibrta karechi, emana ka'omera jan'ya, yara drrhabisbasa rakhe
